page.title: 07CAR AND ENGINE RALLIES
page.content:
Vintage car and traction engine rallies are held about once a fortnight in the summer,on the lawns in front of Harewood House.There are usually about 300 exhibitors and between 2000 and 20000 spectators.
Makes of vintage car include Rolls Royce,Ford,BMW,Oldsmobile and Mercedes Benz. Competitions include "The Smartest Car","The Oldest Car","The Highest Mileage" and "The Most Unusual Number Plate".It costs Â£1 to enter.
Some of the traction engines are used for agriculture, and are working machine bodies, while others are brightly coloured and lit up, as they are used for fairs. They date from 1935.
